pages.title: Gaining Vault XP
pages.text: Inside Vaults, the $(#033dfc)gained xp$() is determined by two factors. The longer you $(#033dfc)spend time inside Vaults$(), the $(#033dfc)more XP$() you gain which caps at $(#033dfc)half the Vault duration$() and whether you $(#033dfc)complete$(), $(#033dfc)bail$() or $(#033dfc)fail$() the vault.
